title: Intro To Scroll Animations
content:
Scroll animations are amazing. They add a ton of life to your site and make it feel so much more full of life. After learning how to add them, I never went back. We’re going to be starting with a library called [Animate On Scroll or AOS](https://michalsnik.github.io/aos/). The first thing you have to do is import the package’s CSS in your `` element. ```html ``` Next, import the AOS JavaScript inside of your `` element. ```html ``` Additionally, you have to initialize the package inside of a ` ``` ## Adding The Animations Now that AOS is setup, let’s get to the fun part: Adding animations! AOS has a variety of animations which you can view on [the website](https://michalsnik.github.io/aos/).
